div:
Introduction This resource is an observation of a Mammography Fat Necrosis. It is typically one observation of a set of related observations that comprise a finding. This and its related obsevations are all referenced by a parent 'section' observation by that parents 'Observation.hasMember' element.
Graphical Overview
This graph provides an overview of how and where Mammography Fat Necrosis is referenced,and what items Mammography Fat Necrosis itself references.
Review Status
NotReviewed
Member Fields The following are fields of this observation that are contained in this resource. Each field contains one data item and is stored in the Observation.component element.
Observed Count component
BiRads Assessment Category component
Change In Definition component
Change In Number component
Change In Prominance component
Change In Size component
Change In State component
Size component
Orientation component
Shape component
Margin component
Density component
Member Observations The following are fields of this observation that are stored in seperate observation resources. Each reference is stored as an item in the Observation.hasMember element.
'Consistent With' reference
'ImagingStudy' reference
'AIM Annotated Imaging Study' reference
